label: Netspeed2wiotp for x86/amd64
description: Sample Horizon workload that uses Horizon's netspeed microservice, which continuously tests network ping and, at lesser intervals: bandwidth.  Results are forwarded to WIoTP

userInput.name: WIOTP_ORG_ID
userInput.label: The WIoTP organization ID of your instance of the WIoTP service

userInput.name: WIOTP_DEVICE_TYPE
userInput.label: The device or gateway type that you created in the WIoTP UI

userInput.name: WIOTP_DEVICE_AUTH_TOKEN
userInput.label: The token you gave to the device or gateway you created in the WIoTP UI
